column6: AXIS TIE-IN! As the events of AXIS reach a boiling point, both X-Men and Avengers find themselves in precarious positions. Not the least of which are Nightcrawler and Mystique-as this tumultuous mother/son combo reaches and a point in their relationship they've never faced before!
column8: | penciller (cover):Kris Anka | artist:Carlo Barberi | writer:Chris Yost
